KCIGF.summary: Karelia Tobacco Company Inc. engages in the manufacture and wholesale of tobacco products in Greece. The company provides cigarettes, cigars, hand rolling cigarettes, and other duty free tobacco products under the George Karelias and Sons, OmÃ©, Karelia Slims, Karelia Blue, Oriental Mist, American Legend, Leader, Karelia Royal, and Wellington brand names. It also exports its products to approximately 65 countries. The company was founded in 1888 and is based in Kalamata, Greece.
